check: Requests the streams related statistics of the beatmap with the provided ID
help: Displays a list of all the bot commands as a hyperlink to the website
invite: Displays a button to invite the bot to a Discord server
invite_discord: Invite the Discord bot to a server
language: Changes the language in which the bot is going to reply
now_playing: Requests the streams related statistics of the currently playing beatmap
request: Requests a stream intensive beatmap with a specified BPM, which may include additional filters
